overview: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology (NIET) is an autonomous institute located in Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh.
NIET is approved by AICTE and affiliated with Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University (AKTU), Lucknow.
The institute offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and integrated programs in engineering, management, and computer applications.
NIET emphasizes industry-oriented education, innovation, and holistic student development.
rankings: NIET has been featured in the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) in the Engineering category in recent years.
The institute has received national recognition through accreditation and ranking frameworks.
awards: Several programs at NIET are accredited by the National Board of Accreditation (NBA).
NIET has received awards for academic excellence and industryâ€“institute collaboration.
The institute is accredited by NAAC with Grade A.
international_alliances: NIET offers international exposure through academic collaborations and twinning programs with foreign universities.

overview: NIET promotes research activities among faculty members and students across engineering, technology, and management disciplines.
The institute encourages innovation, publications, patents, and participation in funded research projects.
publications: Research papers published by faculty and students in national and international journals and conferences.
journals: NIET supports publication in peer-reviewed national and international journals.

facilities: Smart classrooms with modern teaching aids.
Central library with books, journals, and digital resources.
Separate hostels for boys and girls with security and amenities.
